title: Do You Think You Can Run After Reincarnating, Nii-san? - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Horror   Psychological   Romance   Seinen
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Brother Complex   Childhood Friends   Clumsy Love Interests   Coming of Age   Determined Protagonist   Elves   Genius Protagonist   Goddesses   Gore   Handsome Male Lead   Maids   Male Protagonist   Manipulative Characters   Murders   Nobles   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Reverse R*pe   Siblings   Torture   Yandere
author: Kamishiro Kyousuke   紙城境介
description:
Five years since I graduated from high school, and within those years, at the same time I was confined by my younger sister, but it all ended when I ran away and died being hit by a truck. At last I’m free from my devil-like sister! Well, that’s what I thought but my sister was reincarnated with me at the same time in the same world. But this time, I’ll escape from my sister’s clutches and live my life in a different world freely. With the strongest weapon and class I received from god.

Geez onii-san, cheating on me is unforgivable you know~>
